rules_text:
Choose two – 
• Scry X, where X is the number of artifacts you control.
• Sacrifice each noncreature artifact token you control. Create that many 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature tokens.
• Put a vigilance counter on each wild creature you control. [i](Bears, Birds, Cats, Rats, and Spiders are wild creatures.)[/i]
• Each undead creature you control deals 1 damage to target attacking creature. [i](Skeletons, Spirits, Vampires, Wraiths, and Zombies are undead creatures.)[/i]
